availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth“Betsy” Stone McGlone. Father of Eda "Edy" McGlone, Owen McGlone, Ezekiel McGlone, Sanford McGlone, Thomas P. McGlone, James M. McGlone, Mary McGlone, and William A. McGlone. Farmer in Carter County in 1840. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 254.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 230A.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 2, p. 104B.

Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7017479: All Counties, Carter County Deaths, File #3845.
